articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from Venezuelan President
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Venezuelan President 
    Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by Hugo Chavez Frias, president of the Bolivarian Republic of Venezuela, on the occasion of the New Year.
 The gift was handed to the DPRK embassy in Havana on Jan. 13.

articles.title: KCNA Slams Outbursts of IAEA Director General
Plan for War Exercise Announced in S. Korea
articles.content:
Plan for War Exercise Announced in S. Korea 
    Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- The "Army Metropolitan Garrison Command" of south Korea announced a plan to stage tank and military hardware maneuvers from Jan. 18 to 22, KBS of south Korea reported.
 The maneuvers will be reportedly staged in Sodaemun and Unphyong districts of Seoul and the area of Kyonggi Province with the mobilization of a tank battalion under the command.    
 The south Korean bellicose military forces are hell-bent on frantic war exercises in a bid to strain the situation, going against the nation-wide march for realizing cooperation for peace against war.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from Mozambican President
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Mozambican President 
    Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by Mozambican President Joaquim Alberto Chissano.
 The gift was conveyed to Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, by Antonio Inacio Junior, new Mozambican ambassador e. p. to the DPRK, on Jan. 17.

articles.title: Struggle for U.S. Troop Pullout Urged in S. Korea
64th Anti-U.S. Meeting for Solidarity Held in S. Korea
Kim Jong Il's Birthday to Be Celebrated
Sun's Day and February Fete to Be Marked
articles.content:
Sun's Day and February Fete to Be Marked 
    Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held in Quito on Jan. 9 to discuss the significant commemoration of the Sun's Day (President Kim Il Sung's birth anniversary) and the February fete (leader Kim Jong Il's birthday) under the sponsorship of the Ecuadorian preparatory committee for successfully ensuring the "meeting praising the great persons of Mt. Paektu" and building of a monument to the three generals of Mt. Paektu.
 At the meeting, Fabian Guerrero, chairman of the Ecuadorian Committee for Supporting Korea's Independent and Peaceful Reunification, who is a member of the preparatory committee, underlined the significance of the grand commemoration of the Sun's Day and the February holiday this year in which fall the 60th anniversaries of the Workers' Party of Korea and the liberation of Korea.    
 Discussed at the meeting were issues of widely introducing the greatness of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in various forms and methods including film show, lecture, special TV program and commemorative meeting in February and April.
